translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: حجم پرونده بارگذاری شده بیشتر از تنظیمات upload_max_filesize در پرونده php.ini است
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: حجم پرونده بازگذاری شده بیشتر از تنظیمات MAX_FILE_SIZE مشخص شده در فرم HTML است
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: پرونده به صورت ناقص بارگذاری شد
translations.Could not write file to disk: ناتوانی در نوشتن پرونده روی حافظه
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: یک افزونه پی‌اچ‌پی مانع بارگذاری پرونده شد
translations.No file uploaded or file size exceeds ma: پرونده‌ای بارگذاری نشد و یا حجم پرونده بیش از بیشینه مجاز %s بود
translations.{user} has mentioned you in the text doc: {user} has mentioned you in the text document {node}
translations.This file cannot be displayed as downloa: This file cannot be displayed as download is disabled by the share
translations.** 📝 Collaborative document editing!**\n:
** 📝 Collaborative document editing!**

- **📝 Focused writing:** No distractions, only the formatting you need.
- **🙋 Work together:** Share and collaborate with friends and colleagues, no matter if they use Nextcloud or not!
- **💾 Open format:** Files are saved as [Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown), so you can edit them from any other text app too.
- **✊ Strong foundation:** We use [🐈 tiptap](https://tiptap.scrumpy.io) which is based on [🦉 ProseMirror](https://prosemirror.net) – huge thanks to them!
translations.Could not copy result to clipboard: Could not copy result to clipboard
translations.Document idle for {timeout} minutes, cli: Document idle for {timeout} minutes, click to continue editing
translations.This file is opened read-only as it is c: This file is opened read-only as it is currently locked by {user}.
translations.Enter your name so other people can see: Enter your name so other people can see who is editing
translations.Offline, changes will be saved when onli: Offline, changes will be saved when online
translations.The document has been changed outside of: The document has been changed outside of the editor. The changes cannot be applied.
translations.Speed up your writing with simple shortc: Speed up your writing with simple shortcuts.
translations.Just type the Markdown syntax or use key: Just type the Markdown syntax or use keyboard shortcuts from below.
translations.Just type the Markdown syntax from below: Just type the Markdown syntax from below.
translations.name: نام
translations.Cannot copy, please copy the link manual: کپی کردن امکان پذیر نیست ، لطفا پیوند را به صورت دستی کپی کنید
translations.Select file or folder to link to: فایل یا پوشه را برای پیوند انتخاب کنید
translations.To translate individual parts of the tex: To translate individual parts of the text, select it before using the translate function.
translations.Author colors are only shown until every: Author colors are only shown until everyone has closed the document.
